nars.core

Class NARRun

  • java.lang.Object
    • nars.core.NARRun

  • public class NARRun
extends java.lang.Object
    Run Reasoner

    Runs a NAR with addInput. useful for command line or batch functionality; TODO check duplicated code with nars.main.NARS

    Manage the internal working thread. Communicate with Reasoner only.
